segments.text: I feel a sense of sadness watching this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so overwhelmed, she can't even notice the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her drying that plate, and I wonder if she's trying to escape from her worries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, but I think they're just trying to get her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on the stool, and I worry he's going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, looking so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is doing her best, but it's just not enough.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I want to give her a hug and tell her everything is going to be okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know I can't, and that makes me feel helpless.
segments.speaker: PAR
